Notes

Record is housed in an embossed gatefold sleeve. Additional recording at Win & Régine's apartment in Montréal in a week of August 2003 and the winter of 2004 Variations on the titles of some tracks: Track A2: "Neighborhood #2 (Laïka)" on back cover tracklist and insert liner notes, but "Neighborhood #2 (Laika)" on record label tracklist. Track A3: "Une année sans lumiere" on back cover and label, but "Une année sans lumière" on insert. Track B3: "Haiti" on back cover and label, "Haïti" on insert. Lacquer cutting and mastering location credits are identified in runouts. Tracks are sequentially numbered on release.
